titleStmt.title: Taylor's motto Et habeo, et careo, et curo.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.
Cockson, Thomas, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Edward Allde] for I T[rundle] & H G[osson],

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Wither, George. Wither's motto.
The title page is engraved and signed: TC, i.e. Thomas Cockson.
Printer's and booksellers' names from STC.
In this edition B4r line 1 has "Libles".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
